# Module: tf.contrib.bayesflow.halton_sequence



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/python/ops/halton_sequence.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.5/tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/python/ops/halton_sequence.py).

Support for low discrepancy Halton sequences.

## Functions

[`sample(...)`](../../../tf/contrib/bayesflow/halton_sequence/sample): Returns a sample from the `m` dimensional Halton sequence.
